Provide requested attribute value Attribute type Attribute name e.g. age To From Attribute Type Value Select the attribute There are no attributes Given Names Surname Given Names / Surname Place of Birth Date of Birth Date of Expiry Date of Birth / Place of Birth Nationality Gender Male Female Neutral Personal Number Document Number Issuer Verification Status Verified Not verified verified unverified A contact is verified when during import both the camera and NFC chip are used to ensure legitimacy and authenticity of the document. When a contact is not verified, it\'s identity name below may be forged. Identity Name The identity name consists of the initials and surname of the contact that are on the official identity document. If the contact is unverified, the contact can choose it\'s own name. INVALID DOCUMENT NUMBER CHECK DIGIT INVALID DATE OF BIRTH CHECK DIGIT INVALID DATE OF EXPIRY CHECK DIGIT INVALID PERSONAL NUMBER CHECK DIGIT INVALID COMBINED CHECK DIGIT The following identity has been obtained from your document. This identity will be used within this application upon confirmation. Please confirm the correctness of above details. If some details are wrongly scanned, please scan again. The process of importing your identity consists of the following steps. Scan the machine readable zone of your document using your device camera. Hold your document against the back of your device to read the biometric chip. This step ensures that your identity is authentic. If the device has no NFC support, the identity cannot be considered legitimate. This means that there is less trust that the person you\'re chatting with is who he says he is. Confirm the imported identity and start using the application. Hold your document steady to the back of your phone until it has finished. Document successfully read.\nPlease continue to confirm your identity. Reading document…\nPlease hold steady until finished. Scan the machine readable zone on the front of your passport or the back of the ID card. The machine readable zone is marked in red in the documents below. Please click on your identity document type. Fit the machine readable zone of your identity document inside the red square below. Hold your phone as steady as possible and wait until the scan is finished.
